metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Veterinary Technician - Bilingual (English / Spanish)
content:
Our Opportunity:
Chewy’s mission is to be the most trusted and convenient destination for pet parents and partners everywhere. We view pets (and pet parents) as family and are obsessed with meeting their needs and exceeding customer expectations through every interaction. Veterinarians the Chewy Health team is focused on advancing how veterinarians and pet parents care for pets and are on a multi-year journey to enhance the experience of working with veterinarians to keep pets happy and healthy.
As part of this mission, Chewy Health is hiring a Bilingual Veterinary Technician in our Florida offices to help us build a suite of services that enable pet parents to engage with their veterinarian through every step of their pet parent journey. This position is a unique opportunity to work with one of the most dynamic and innovative teams at Chewy.
What You'll Do:
· As a Veterinarian Technician you will set the bar for providing high-level, competent veterinary medical care and embodying the Chewy culture to work collaboratively with your peers and deliver the pet parent WOW experience.
· Be an advocate for high-quality pet healthcare while embodying the Chewy culture to work collaboratively with your peers and deliver a best-in-class customer experience.
· Collaborate with Chewy Health team members on the development of current and new services and products.
· Provide subject matter expertise on companion animal health and wellness for Chewy Health, while championing proactive and consistent pet healthcare
· Participate in program development and enhancing training procedures.
· Identify and triage platform improvements and support innovative advancements.
· Leverage accredited skills to develop programming, policies and services that deliver an unparalleled client experience.
 
What You'll Need:
· Successful completion of an accredited veterinary technology program and current licensure is preferred.
· 1+ years of veterinary technician experience.
· Proficient computer skills, as this role will require interacting with customers and Chewy team members through various digital channels.
· Proven experience in embracing forward thinking and curiosity.
· Exemplary listening and problem-solving skills.
· Ability to multitask comfortably.
· Experience collaborating with, utilizing a team-oriented environment.
· Passion for helping people and pets with empathy and excellent customer service focus.
· Strong verbal and written communication skills.
· Comfortable in a fast paced, self-starter environment
 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
